## Welcome to the main page

This course is about going from Excel to R.

Course participants, it would greatly help us if fill out our feedback form \[UPDATE\] (March 2024): <https://forms.office.com/e/4RL8XE0s2C>

The course material is originally made by Professor Helle Sørensen and Associate Professor Bo Markussen, SCIENCE data lab, Department of Mathematical Sciences at the University of Copenhagen. Contact: [helle\@math.ku.dk](mailto:helle@math.ku.dk) or [bomar\@math.ku.dk](mailto:bomar@math.ku.dk).

The introduction presentation is made by, and the course material is edited by Thilde Terkelsen, Academic officer, Center for Health Data Science, Faculty of Health and Medical Sciences, University of Copenhagen. Contact: [thilde.terkelsen\@sund.ku.dk](mailto:thilde.terkelsen@sund.ku.dk) or [andrejeva\@sund.ku.dk](mailto:andrejeva@sund.ku.dk)

The material in this repository is for teaching purposes only and not to be distributed commercially.
